hero.subtitle: Neubautonomy in Type & Design. Design for Designer

about.title: ABOUT US
about.paragraph1: Elephantgun, founded in 2020, emerged from a personal notebook. We're an eco-conscious brand committed to benefiting the planet while offering a unique, authentic style.
about.paragraph2: Our ongoing collection, "IF YOU'RE FUNNY OR WEIRD", features 45x45 ECObags hand-painted by Bianca (she/her). Each Elephantgun BaG is as unique as you are, with random drops throughout the week.
about.paragraph3: We offer three ECObag models: the traditional 45x45, a waterproof 36x30 with adjustable strap, and the versatile "BOLSA ELEPHANTGUN" with two zippered compartments.
about.paragraph4: At Elephantgun, we believe that even small actions can lead to a better future. By thinking of others, we become better people.

manifesto.description: DESIGN MEETS SUSTAINABILITY. EACH BAG IS A STATEMENT OF ECOLOGICAL RESPONSIBILITY.
